title: Hour 1: Fins Sins
description:
In this episode, Tim Kurkjian and Karl Ravech join the show to help us remember hall of fame sportscaster Vin Scully in the wake of his passing. Dan Orlovsky, Katie George, and Domonique Foxworth discuss the punishment handed to the Dolphins after they were found to have violated the NFL's anti-tampering policy and debate whether or not the NFL should appeal Deshaun Watson's 6-game suspension with less than 24 hours to go until the appeal deadline.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Did the NFL get the Dolphins tampering punishment right?
